meta.title: PROTOFOLIO_ by siddharthmhjn.com
meta.description: Tony Stark - CEO of Stark Industries and Iron Man. Building technology to protect the world and power the future.

personal.name: Tony Stark
personal.title: Genius, Billionaire, Philanthropist
personal.subtitle: Iron Man | Avenger | Inventor
personal.footerDescription: CEO of Stark Industries & Iron Man. Building technology to protect the world.

skills.title: Technical Arsenal
skills.description: Comprehensive expertise across advanced technology, AI systems, and next-generation engineering

projects.title: Featured Inventions
projects.description: Showcasing world-changing innovations in defense, energy, and artificial intelligence

experience.title: Heroic Journey
experience.description: From weapons manufacturer to Earth's mightiest defender

blog.title: Stark Tech Blog
blog.description: Insights on arc reactor technology, AI development, and saving the world

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: For world-saving emergencies or Stark Industries inquiries

description: Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. Built the first Iron Man suit in a cave with a box of scraps.
Pioneer of arc reactor technology, creator of J.A.R.V.I.S. and F.R.I.D.A.Y. AI systems.
Founding member of the Avengers, led the team through multiple world-ending threats.
Cracked time travel and saved half the universe. I am Iron Man.

expertise.title: Arc Reactor Technology
expertise.description: Invented miniaturized arc reactor technology providing clean, unlimited energy for suits and buildings.

expertise.title: Artificial Intelligence
expertise.description: Created advanced AI systems including J.A.R.V.I.S., F.R.I.D.A.Y., EDITH, and the Vision.

expertise.title: Armor Engineering
expertise.description: Designed 85+ iterations of the Iron Man suit with nanotech, weapons systems, and space capabilities.

projects.title: Iron Man Armor Series
projects.description: 85+ iterations of powered exoskeleton suits with flight, weapons, AI, and nanotech capabilities.

projects.title: J.A.R.V.I.S. AI System
projects.description: Advanced natural language AI assistant managing complex systems, security, and suit operations.

projects.title: Stark Tower
projects.description: Self-sustaining skyscraper powered by arc reactor. Avengers headquarters.

experience.title: CEO & Lead Inventor
responsibilities: Transformed company from weapons to clean energy leader
Invented arc reactor and Iron Man armor series

experience.title: Founding Member
achievements: Defended New York against Chitauri invasion
Led team against Ultron and Thanos

experience.title: Quantum Engineer
impact: Cracked the code for time travel
Designed Time-Space GPS for quantum realm navigation
Reversed the Snap, saving half of all life

awards.title: Saved the Universe
awards.description: Used the Infinity Gauntlet to reverse the Snap and defeat Thanos, sacrificing everything.

awards.title: Person of the Year
awards.description: Led defense of New York City against Chitauri invasion, carried nuke through wormhole.

awards.title: Apogee Award
awards.description: Honored for advancing technology and clean energy through arc reactor innovation.

testimonials.name: Steve Rogers
testimonials.quote: The most annoying person I've met, but also one of the bravest. He made the sacrifice play.

testimonials.name: Pepper Potts
testimonials.quote: Behind the armor was the most selfless person I've ever known.

testimonials.name: Peter Parker
testimonials.quote: Mr. Stark believed in me when no one else did. Everything I am, I owe to him.

blog.title: Arc Reactor Technology Explained
blog.excerpt: Learn how I miniaturized a particle accelerator to fit in my chest and power the Iron Man suit.

blog.title: Building J.A.R.V.I.S.: AI That Actually Helps
blog.excerpt: The journey from a simple assistant to a fully sentient AI that became Vision.

blog.title: So You Want to Invent Time Travel
blog.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to quantum realm navigation and not creating alternate timelines.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content: Stark Industries collects information you provide through our contact forms. Unlike certain government agencies, we respect your privacy and don't have a helicarrier scanning your communications.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: Information collected is used to respond to inquiries about Stark Industries products and services. We do not sell your data - we're not that kind of company anymore.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: Your data is protected by the same security systems that guard the Iron Man suits. F.R.I.D.A.Y. monitors all access attempts 24/7.

sections.heading: Cookies
sections.content: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience. They're less intrusive than Ultron, I promise.

sections.heading: Contact
sections.content: Questions about privacy? Contact Pepper Potts at Stark Industries. She handles these things better than I do.

sections.heading: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing this website, you agree to these terms. It's a lot simpler than the Sokovia Accords, trust me.

sections.heading: Use of Content
sections.content: All content including arc reactor schematics, suit designs, and AI code is proprietary to Stark Industries. Unauthorized reproduction will result in a visit from Legal... or worse, Pepper.

sections.heading: Contact Form
sections.content: When using the contact form, provide accurate information. No, you cannot order an Iron Man suit. Stop asking.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Stark Industries is not responsible for any alien invasions, rogue AI, or time travel paradoxes that may occur while visiting this site.

sections.heading: Changes to Terms
sections.content: These terms may be updated. Continued use constitutes acceptance. Unlike the Avengers roster, these changes are usually less dramatic.
